title: Peter & Gordon - Greatest Hits [CEMA 10 Best Series] (1991)
description:
This is the same torrent that was uploaded to Demonoid in November 2007.


Peter & Gordon - Greatest Hits [CEMA 10 Best Series] (1991)

Includes:
Files by track, ripped at FLAC 8 using Easy CD-DA Extractor (www.poikosoft.com)
Tracks have full tags.
All artwork in jpgs at 300 d.p.i. Rotated and cropped losslessly.
AMG Review.txt
Notes.txt (which is simply these notes included in the torrent)

Excerpt from All Music:

In June 1964, Peter & Gordon became the very first British Invasion act after the Beatles to take the number one spot on the American charts with "A World Without Love." That hit, and their subsequent successes, were due as much or more to their important connections as to their talent. ...

... a sort of Everly Brothers-styled duo for the British Invasion that faintly prefigured the folk-rock of the mid-'60s.

...

AMG Review
by Stephen Thomas Erlewine

Greatest Hits is a budget-priced, ten-track selection of some of Peter & Gordon's hits, and while there are plenty of essential items missing, it still functions as a good, affordable sampler, featuring such hits as "A World Without Love," "I Go to Pieces," "True Love Ways," "Lady Godiva" and "Knight in Rusty Armour." 

Track List:

01. A World Without Love
02. Nobody I Know
03. I Don't Want To See You Again
04. I Go To Pieces
05. True Love Ways
06. To Know You Is To Love You
07. Woman
08. Lady Godiva
09. Knight In Rusty Armour
10. Sunday For Tea
